Title: Arrow on the Doorpost
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Ryan C. Coleman
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: Rick and The Governor meet face-to-face, ostensibly to make a peaceful resolution to prevent further bloodshed. Back at the prison, tensions arise between Merle and the rest of the group.
